channel.title: Go Tell It On The Mountain
channel.itunes:summary: Hi everyone! This is a collection of my weekly sermons, and an occasional special service. It may at times also include a special message or study that I have presented somewhere. I occasionally speak to other groups outside of our church.
channel.description: Hi everyone! This is a collection of my weekly sermons, and an occasional special service. It may at times also include a special message or study that I have presented somewhere. I occasionally speak to other groups outside of our church.

image.title: Go Tell It On The Mountain

channel.itunes:author: Mike Hanson

item.title: Keeping Your Focus
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: Jesus had a clear sense of his destiny; meaning he had a clear vision of his ministry. Along came a wedding feast and he was called upon to fulfill a family obligation. He did so, but made it clear that his destiny was not therein contained. He kept a clear focus on his vison. And Mary trusted that. We need to keep the same kind of desire to Will One Thing, and let God take care of the rest.
item.itunes:keywords: God, Vison, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: Our Mission
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: After the wedding in Cana, Jesus returned to his home town. Many of those hometown folks had been at the wedding and had witnessed the sign of water changed to wine. They wanted a miracle in their town as well. But they are missing the point of Jesus' ministry. He's not about making lots of wine. He is about binding up the broken-hearted. That's our mission as well.
item.itunes:keywords: God, Vison, Pain, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: God At Work
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:keywords: God, Vison, Pain, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: God At Work
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:keywords: God, Vison, Pain, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: Paradox
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: God's ways appear paradoxical to us in scripture. We have to die to live and if we want to live we will die, and so on. But there is a rhyme and reason to God's ways that demonstrate his marvelous love for us.
item.itunes:keywords: God, Vison, Pain, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: To Know Christ
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: We do a lot of things in our relationships. But the essence of the relationship is intimacy. This is true of our human relationships as well as our relationship with God. All the things we do are not nearly as important as the intimacy we share.
item.itunes:keywords: God, Vison, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: Jesus, Incarnated in Flesh
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: When Jesus became human, he emplied himself of all divinity while on earth. The Holy Spirit came upon him and, as he said to the people in Nazareth, he preached, healed and set free. The writer to the Hebrews therefore said we have now a High Priest Jesus who understands us intimately. We can approach him in prayer therefore with confidence.
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Incarnation, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: Give a good word, Glorify God
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: Words speak either life or death to others and to ourselves. A gripe travels 10 times faster than a compliment. So if we want to see God glorified in our midst, we have to be sure to get the good word out, not the bad one. 9 ungrateful lepers were healed that gave God no glory. Don't be one of them.
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Glory, Compliments, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: July 4th
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: The US is one example of what God intended the church to be
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Glory, Independence, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: July 11th
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: Missconceptions, We are living on too many false assumptions. And we even often miss the significence of what God is doing around us every day! What would your life be like if you had the ROCK SOLID conviction that God is Good, to you?
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, God is Good, Forgiveness, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: August 1st: What do you see, when you see a blizzard?
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: We see things differently than God sees them. We see a snow storm and think, "Oh No, 3 feet of back breaking snow to remove." We could be looking at that as an opportunity to blow out our drive way, AND our neighbors driveway. We look at the heat and think how miserable the day will be, rather than see that as an opportunity to offer someone some cool refreshment. So how do we see God's gifts to us?
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Glory, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: August 22, 2010
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Glory, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Glory, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: September 19, 2010
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: A lot of things went wrong at The Fall, which continue to happen today in our relationships. It's time we seek reconciliation, and become reconcilors of the world.
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Glory, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: October 3, 2010
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: God is at Work all around us and through us and in us. When we lose sight of that we lose out on a lot of blessings. Joseph knew God was in control and his solid confidence in the Lord kept him open to hearing from God, even in the depths of a prison!
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Glory, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: October 10, 2010
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: God is at Work all around us and through us and in us.
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Glory, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: October 17, 2010
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: God is at Work all around us and through us and in us. Moses set a tent far from the camp as a place where all Israelites could go to hear from God in the quiet of the desert. Where is your quite spot? Are you managing this one faithfully? God will meet you in the quiet place.
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Glory, Love, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible

item.title: October 31, 2010
item.itunes:author: Dr Mike Hanson
item.dc:creator: Mike Hanson
item.itunes:summary: God is at Work all around us and through us and in us. He is constantly reforming his Church, by the work of his Holy Spirit. We are looking at what the Spirit was doing in Martin Luther during the Reformation, and asking the question, "How is the Holy Spirit reforming the Church today?"
item.itunes:keywords: God, Prayer, Holy Spirit, Reformation, Martin Luther, Mission, Kingdom, revelation, Righteousness, Christianity, Grace, Discipleship, sermon, bible
